tool_description: Predicts future ingredient and supply demands based on historical sales data, seasonal patterns, and upcoming events.

forecast_period_days.description: Number of days ahead to forecast (1-90)

historical_days.description: Days of historical data to analyze (30-365)

error_messages: Invalid forecast period: forecast_period_days must be between 1 and 90 days.
Insufficient historical data: Need at least 14 days of sales history. Current data spans fewer days.
Invalid historical period: historical_days must be between 30 and 365 days.
Data quality issue: Historical sales data contains significant gaps or anomalies that may affect forecast accuracy.
usage: Specify how many days ahead to forecast and optionally adjust historical analysis period and seasonal settings. The tool analyzes past sales patterns to predict future ingredient needs.

forecast_dates.description: Date strings for each forecasted day

predicted_covers.description: Predicted number of customers served each day

confidence_scores.description: Confidence percentage for each day's prediction (0-100)

seasonal_factors.description: Seasonal multipliers applied to base forecast
